Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)
The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
MT \MT\ n. A {metric ton}, a unit of weight equivalent to 1000 kilograms. [abbr.]
Syn: metric ton, tonne, t. [WordNet 1.5]

Definition.WordDefinition: MT n 1: a unit of weight equivalent to 1000 kilograms [syn: {metric ton}, {tonne}, {t}] 2: a state in northwestern United States on the Canadian border [syn: {Montana}, {Treasure State}] 3: the use of computers to translate from one language to another [syn: {machine translation}]
